summary: Reality movie of a few days in the life of a Czech teenager when he starts work.
cast: Ladislav Jakim|Pavla Martinkova|Jan Vostrcil|Bozena Matuskova|Pavel Sedlacek|Vladimír Pucholt|Zdenek Kulhanek|Frantisek Kosina|Josef Koza|Antonín Pokorný|Jaroslav Kladrubsky|Frantiska Skalova|Jaroslav Bendl|Majka Gillarova|Jaroslava Razova|Dana Urbankova|Susan Kodicek|Frantisek Prazak
title: Pedro, el negro
